title: Firecracker jinx is 1350RP in store instead of the sale price of 975RP (BUG?)
body: Firecracker jinx was supposed to be on sale until the 26th of February for 975 RP. But in the store, it is currently going for 1350RP.

replies.body: This has been corrected, sorry about that and thank you for the report Flinty.

I'd like to report a different issue. I saw that the skin was 975RP but there was no '33% off' advertisement so I assumed that that was the normal price so I didn't rush out to get it. I just checked again then about to buy it only to find the price is now 1350RP. I'm disappointed more that there wasn't the usual % off image attached to the price as I would have grabbed it then and there had I known that price was limited. I guess now i'm just gonna have to play the waiting game for a 50% off sale 6+ months from now. :(
